### Chart A

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(plyr)

dataset <- read_excel("C:/Users/Irene/Desktop/畫圖.xlsx")

f <- ggplot(data = dataset) +
        geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = year, y = ntu, fill = income), stat = "identity")+
        scale_fill_manual(values=c("#D2E9FF", "#ECF5FF", "#FFF4C1", "#FFE66F", "#FFD306"))
ggplotly(f)

```
